Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities- BS, or MS in Computer Science or equivalent experience- 8 years software engineering experience- Excellent coding skills in one or more of the following : ROR/J2EE Spring Framework- Strong computer science fundamentals (Design Patterns, DS & Algos, Operating Systems)- Databases: Exposure to both RDBMS and NoSQL- Web Technologies: HTTP Life cycle, REST hands-on (must), Caching, Messaging Technologies etc- Knowledge of web libraries and frameworks such as Ember.js, Angular.js, Backbone.js, Node.js/Express- Experience in HLD and LLD- Using services oriented architecture (SOA) you will build/test for scale, performance and reliability.- Thrives in a dynamic environment, using agile methodologies- Is detail-oriented and has creative problem-solving skills- Has excellent written and oral communication skills
